mdRecord.dcterms:title: Odes, enigmes, et epigrammes: addressez pour etreines, au Roy, à la Royne, à Madame Marguerite & autres princes & princesses de france / par Charles Fontaine Parisien
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Bauzonnet, Antoine, 1795-1882
Citoys, Jean
Douglas H. Gordon Collection of French Books (University of Virginia)
Fontaine, Charles, approximately 1514-
mdRecord.dcterms:description: SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Binder: Bauzonnet. Folded sheet ([4]} p.) of handwritten notes, which was laid in, has been placed in the collection Insert File. The sheet also has the ownership stamp of Mr. Joseph Nouvellet. Coste is identified as a former owner. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 486.
